Description:
Contribute to increasing company profits through fruitful customer relationships.
Present reports of potential prospects to the management for aiding critical business decisions.
Ensure achievement of all sales target and analyses all company objectives.
Maintain accurate records of all sales and prospecting activities to analyze the sales prospects.
Take charge of promotional and sales activities by brainstorming new product or service launches with appropriate team members.
Boosting sales prospects through effective utilization of consumer sales, dealer, PR, and business promotion techniques.Skills
Skills:
Understanding of the sales process and dynamics.
Proven track record of maintaining professional ethics through the portrayal of exemplary soft skills.
Approaching new and existing customers by following optimum consumer service standards.
Ability to prioritize targets as per the requirements set forth by the company.
Excellent phone and presentation skills.
Strong negotiation skills.
